column1: tower_des_2001_0~Huntsman in the Alsace region are recruited and trained by Claudia as a basic defense force
column2: capable of striking enemies that can fly and on the ground.

column1: tower_des_2001_1~The huntsman are well trained to become good archers
column2: capable of shooting faster and further

column1: tower_des_2001_2~Seasoned Master Archers can quickly shoot heavy arrows that have formidable breaking power
tower_des_2002_0~Trainee of Endia wizards. Their spells are very effective against enemies with heavy armor
tower_des_2002_1~Wizards with real combat experience. Their magic is strengthened with great damage
tower_des_2002_2~Excellent wizards with outstanding magical power can sweep the enemy formation
tower_des_2003_0~The souls of the ancient protectors are sealed in magical stones. When summoned
column2: they will transform into giant stone warriors attacking enemies on the ground
capable of throwing rocks that deal massive damage

column1: tower_des_2003_2~The powerful Protector can sweep and control the enemies on a large area
tower_des_2004_0~The initial force of the resistance army
column2: has basic training and can block the enemy's path

column1: tower_des_2004_1~Infantry soldiers with extensive experience in battle
column2: well equipped. They are brave warriors and absolutely loyal to Claudia

column1: tower_des_2004_2~The resilient knights of Claudia. They are warriors with Claudia through many battles
column2: absolutely loyal and ready to destroy all enemies in the way.

tower_skill_des_2001_1~Increase {0}% attack speed for friendly tower in range
tower_skill_des_2002_0~The wizard shoots a magical skill into the sky
column2: casting magic blows on {0} enemies. Each attack deals {1} magic damage

column1: tower_skill_des_2002_1~Summons a magic portal that teleports {0} enemies backwards for a distance

column2: creating {0} cracks and dealing {1} damage to all enemies hit

column1: tower_skill_des_2003_0_update~Cracks explode dealing {0} bonus damage and reducing {1}% enemy movement speed

column2: dealing {0} damage and slowing all enemies in the area of effect
each Alsace Paladin has {0}% chance to launch a Counter Attack and deal {1} area damage

column1: tower_skill_des_2004_1~Increases {0}% armor and {1}% magic resistance of the Alsace Paladins
